name: Automate transactional emails from KlickTipp via Gmail
description:
This scenario listens for contact data sent from KlickTipp outbound and automatically sends a personalized email via Gmail to the recipient. Key details — such as the customer’s name, company, or other custom fields — can be dynamically mapped into the email subject and body, allowing you to create professional, accurate, and branded messages. The workflow also updates the email content and the contact’s email delivery status in KlickTipp, giving you clear visibility into which emails were successfully sent and which failed.

Perfect for online businesses, e-commerce stores, coaches, consultants, and service providers who want to send important updates, confirmations, or personalized messages instantly without manual intervention. By combining Gmail’s reliable delivery with KlickTipp’s contact management, this automation ensures recipients get timely information while keeping your database up to date.

This integration empowers you to send immediate messages, track delivery outcomes, and trigger follow-up sequences in KlickTipp based on delivery status. With automated sending and tracking, you save time, reduce errors, and maintain a professional communication experience — while freeing yourself to focus on sales, customer service, and business growth.
